Nicholas Sendyk

Data Engineer & AI/ML Enthusiast

Data Engineer & AI/ML Enthusiast. Passionate about building intelligent systems that make sense of complex data. Turning caffeine into code and curiosity into solutions.

Get In Touch View Projects

About Me

As a Data Engineer specializing in AI/ML technologies, I bridge the gap between raw data and actionable intelligence. My work focuses on architecting robust data ecosystems that power cutting-edge machine learning applications, with particular expertise in leveraging Large Language Models to transform unstructured information into valuable insights. Graduating with a perfect 4.0 GPA in Software Engineering from Carleton University, I blend rigorous technical foundations with practical industry experience to solve complex data challenges.

Ottawa: My Home & Inspiration

Born and raised in Ottawa, I've developed a profound appreciation for our city's unique character—where government corridors intersect with tech innovation hubs against a backdrop of natural beauty. From winter skating along the world's largest frozen canal to summer hikes through Gatineau Park's vibrant trails, Ottawa's diverse landscape continually fuels my creativity and shapes my collaborative, solution-oriented approach to engineering challenges.

Beyond the world of data and code, I'm an avid trail runner exploring Ottawa's extensive trail networks, a global traveler who has immersed myself in 15 countries (and counting), and a passionate tinkerer whose home automation projects frequently result in more blinking LEDs than my square footage reasonably justifies. This blend of outdoor adventure, cultural exploration, and technical experimentation keeps my problem-solving skills sharp and my perspective fresh.

Work Experience

Data Engineer
